news.content:
Recently, Scott (from the TF Foundation) interviewed Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

ðŸ’¬ You can find the interview here.

Itâ€™s quite a fascinating discussion and gives insight on the technical hurdles and motivations for developing private, decentralized, and open source alternatives to popular products from major corporations.
news.excerpt: Insights into developing P2P Grid solutions using the Digital Twin platform.

next.title: A Conversation with Jeroen Douglas
next.excerpt: An enlightening conversation between ThreeFold co-founder Weynand Kuijpers and Solidaridad Network (ThreeFold partner) Executive Director Jeroen Douglas.
